hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that plundering #Lon Lon Ranch# is a foolish choice.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that the #final treasures of Ice Cavern# are...^ #Saria's Song# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #the Graveyard# is on the path of time.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Purple Rupee#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: These hints can be quite useful. This is an exception.

GC (Maze).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Boomerang#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #Bombs (20 pieces)#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #the Deku Tree# is on the way of the hero.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #a Strength Upgrade# can be found at #Zora's River#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that inside #Jabu Jabu#, one can find #the Deku Tree#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #wooden walls# in the Shadow Temple hide...^ #a Purple Rupee# and #Saria's Song#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple Spike Walls Left Chest

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# is on the way of the hero.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Boomerang#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Goron Tunic#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #Bombchus (10 pieces)# and #a Wallet#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Zora's Domain# is on the path to #Twinrova#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that the final reward from the #Frogs of Zora's River# is #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# hoards #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that ##Gerudo Valley## has #2# major items.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that deep #under a vast lake#, one can find #the Water Temple#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that the #Fire Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that #within the Spirit Trial#, chests contain...^ #the Fire Arrows# and #a Purple Rupee#.
